SELECT b.nid, b.title, CASE WHEN b.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, b.count, b.likes, a.nickname as writer, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM info_notice_reply c WHERE c.nid = b.nid ) as repcount FROM info_notice b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno WHERE 1=1
AND b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND a.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY b.nid DESC LIMIT #{skiprow}, #{pagerow}

SELECT b.nid, b.title, CASE WHEN b.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, b.count, b.likes, a.nickname as writer FROM info_notice b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno ORDER BY b.nid DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT b.nid, b.title, b.regdate, b.content, a.nickname as writer, b.userno, b.count, b.likes
FROM info_notice b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno WHERE b.nid = #{nid}
